name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel I - Kai
summary:
A remaster of the Playstation 3 and Vita game now in 4K at 60fps with a high-speed skip mode that runs the story/events at 2 times normal speed and battles at 4.

- Data from Trails of Cold Steel will allow you to continue from were you were in the original version of the game.
- Data from Trails of Cold Steel III will unlock extra costumes, bonding points, and money for your second playthrough.
